title: Why is TFT not an app?
body: Idk why Riot doesn’t make TFT an app. I want to play it on my phone like everyone else does. It would make a lot more money then the pc version. You can make it link to your league account. Would be awesome. If riot needs someone to take the lead on it hire me and I’ll make sure you have an app that is beautiful for TFT that makes lots of money. Gg Ez.

replies.body:
Low system requirements... overly simple interface... of course it's coming to mobile. 

Eventually.
Yeah I thought the same thing. Hope riot does it.

Just the fact you think it is this easy shows how utterly unqualified you are to touch any form of software development.

Riot has already suggested a mobile release will happen if it does well, but adapting the engine to mobile will take significant work, and it is still in a highly unfinished beta on PC.

Lol kid you take things so seriously.  When an adc misses a common minion in lane don’t rage quit. There are loads of other games with 100+ mill players on mobile that are more complicated then TFT. 
I never said it would be easy to develop. “The fact you think it is this easy shows how utterly unqualified you...” LOL so funny how into it people get on the internet. 
Just because I’m pooping before work I’ll explain myself. When I said “gg ez” I said it at the end of the post, it was less about how hard development was and more like an ending to the post. Like at the end of a league game in all chat ppl type “gg” or “gg ez”
Anyways have a good day
Are you drunk? What the fuck did any of that even mean?
